facilities.name: IU Health Methodist Hospital
facilities.notes: Main hospital building, generally open 24/7 for hospital services. Office hours for administrative services often M-F 8 AM - 5 PM.

facilities.name: Riley Hospital for Children
facilities.notes: Pediatric hospital, generally open 24/7 for hospital services. Office hours for administrative services often M-F 8 AM - 5 PM.

facilities.name: IU Health University Hospital
facilities.notes: Open 24/7. Visiting hours may have specific guidelines; check with the care team. Cafes and bistros within the hospital have varying hours.

facilities.name: IU Health Neuroscience Center
facilities.notes: Combines comprehensive neurological services. Specific clinic hours may vary.

facilities.name: IU Health Simon Cancer Center
facilities.address: 1030 W Michigan St, Indianapolis, IN 46202 (part of the Indiana Cancer Pavilion)
facilities.notes: Office Hours: 7:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.

facilities.name: Community Fairbanks Recovery Center
facilities.notes: Office hours: Mon-Fri 8 AM - 9 PM; Sat and Sun 8 AM - 5 PM Eastern Time. Inpatient Detox Admission: Daily 24 hours.

facilities.name: Community Heart and Vascular Hospital
facilities.notes: Open 24/7. A facility of Community Hospital East.

facilities.name: Community Hospital East
facilities.notes: Open 24/7. Java City cafe in the lobby: Mon-Fri, 6:30 AM to 1 PM; Sat and Sun, closed.

facilities.name: Community Hospital North
facilities.notes: Generally open 24/7 for hospital services. (This is a commonly listed address, but specific address might vary for different departments. Confirm on their site.)

facilities.name: Community Hospital South
facilities.address: 1402 E County Line Rd S, Indianapolis, IN 46227
facilities.notes: Generally open 24/7 for hospital services. (This is a commonly listed address, but specific address might vary for different departments. Confirm on their site.)

facilities.name: Community Rehabilitation Hospital North
facilities.notes: Rehabilitation focus. Specific program hours may vary. (This is a commonly listed address, but specific address might vary for different departments. Confirm on their site.)

facilities.name: Ascension St. Vincent Indianapolis Hospital
facilities.notes: Open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Level I trauma center.

facilities.name: Peyton Manning Children's Hospital
facilities.notes: Located within the Ascension St. Vincent Indianapolis Hospital campus.

facilities.name: St. Vincent Seton Specialty Hospital
facilities.notes: Specializes in long-term acute care. (Typically co-located or very near the main St. Vincent campus)

facilities.name: St. Vincent Women and Infants Hospital
facilities.notes: Located within the Ascension St. Vincent Indianapolis Hospital campus.

facilities.name: Sidney & Lois Eskenazi Hospital
facilities.notes: Open 24/7. Serves Marion County residents, including uninsured/underinsured.

facilities.name: Michael & Susan Smith Emergency Department at Eskenazi Health
facilities.phone: (317) 880-0000 (Main switchboard) or (317) 880-7666 (Eskenazi Health Connections for non-emergency medical questions)
facilities.notes: Emergency department is open 24/7. For mental health emergencies, call 988 or (317) 880-8485. (Part of the main hospital)

facilities.name: Sandra Eskenazi Mental Health Center
facilities.address: 720 Eskenazi Ave, Indianapolis, IN 46202 (Various service locations, main campus address)
facilities.notes: Offers a range of behavioral health services. Crisis Intervention Unit hours: 8:30 AM â€“ 11 PM. Emergency psychiatric services provided by crisis specialist clinicians from 11 PM - 8:30 AM.

facilities.name: Franciscan Health Indianapolis
facilities.notes: Generally open 24/7 for hospital services.

facilities.name: OrthoIndy Hospital Northwest
facilities.notes: Specializes in orthopedic care. Specific surgery and clinic hours vary.

facilities.name: Richard L. Roudebush VA Medical Center
facilities.notes: Provides healthcare services to eligible veterans. Hours for specific clinics and services will vary.

facilities.name: Kindred Hospital Indianapolis
facilities.notes: Long-term acute care hospital. (Likely co-located with IU Health Methodist)

facilities.name: Kindred Hospital Indianapolis North
facilities.notes: Long-term acute care hospital. Visiting hours: 8 AM to 8 PM, staff are flexible for patient and family needs. Cafeteria hours: Mon-Fri, 11:30 AM - 1:30 PM.

hospital_systems.system_name: Indiana Family and Social Services Administration

facilities.name: NeuroDiagnostic Institute
facilities.notes: Focuses on neurological evaluations and mental health services. Office Hours: Mon-Fri 8 AM - 4 PM. (General FSSA number, confirm direct NDI phone)

clinics_and_urgent_care.name: IU Health Urgent Care - Downtown Indianapolis
clinics_and_urgent_care.notes: Hours: Mon-Fri 7 AM - 7 PM; Sat-Sun 9 AM - 3 PM. Offers walk-in and save-a-spot options. Also offers virtual visits (6 AM - 11 PM). Several other IU Health Urgent Care locations exist throughout Indianapolis with similar hours.

clinics_and_urgent_care.name: Indiana Immediate Care
clinics_and_urgent_care.address: 860 E 86th St, Indianapolis, IN 46240 (Example location, they have multiple)
clinics_and_urgent_care.notes: Hours vary by location, but generally Mon-Fri 9 AM - 9 PM; Sat-Sun 9 AM - 5 PM.

clinics_and_urgent_care.name: The Little Clinic (Kroger)
clinics_and_urgent_care.address: Various Kroger locations across Indianapolis (e.g., 5242 W 38th St, Indianapolis, IN 46254 - check specific Kroger store)
clinics_and_urgent_care.phone: Varies by location, often listed on Kroger's website or in-store.
clinics_and_urgent_care.notes: Walk-in clinics located inside select Kroger grocery stores. Hours typically align with store hours but can be more limited (e.g., Mon-Fri 8 AM - 8 PM, Sat-Sun 8 AM - 5 PM).

clinics_and_urgent_care.name: Gennesaret Free Clinics
clinics_and_urgent_care.address: 3001 E 30th St, Indianapolis, IN 46218 (Main clinic at St. Vincent de Paul Food Pantry)
clinics_and_urgent_care.notes: Provides free healthcare services. Medical Clinic hours: Mon 9 AM - 2 PM, Tue 9 AM - 12 PM, Wed 10 AM - 2 PM, Thu 9 AM - 12 PM (with additional 5 PM - 7 PM hours), Fri 8:30 AM - 12:30 PM. Walk-in hours also available on weekends.

clinics_and_urgent_care.name: Indiana University Student Outreach Clinic
clinics_and_urgent_care.address: 3125 E 10th St, Suite D, Indianapolis, IN 46201
clinics_and_urgent_care.notes: Free clinic for uninsured and underserved. Hours: Every Wednesday 5 PM - 8 PM & Every Saturday 9:30 AM - 2 PM. Closed on major holidays.
